div.p: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual parcitipates in an encounter
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/participant-type

tr.td: A translator who is facilitating communication with the patient during the encounter
A person to be contacted in case of an emergency during the encounter

div.p: In addition, this value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ParticipationType where concept is-a _ParticipationAncillary
